    NLM ICD-10-CM 2023 API

NLM ICD-10-CM 2023 API

Source: vignettes/articles/nlm_icd10cm_2023.Rmd
nlm_icd10cm_2023.Rmd
library(codexchain)


Information on Providers That are Missing Digital Contact Information in the NPPES System.


ICD-10-CM (International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision, Clinical Modification) is a medical coding system for classifying diagnoses and reasons for visits in U.S. health care settings.


API Data Dictionary

Variable Description

npi
National Provider Identifier
The provider's 10-digit National Provider Identifier.

provider_name
Provider Name
Name of the provider. It consists of the legal last name followed by the first name, separated by a comma.


Related Links

  • CMS Public Reporting of Missing Digital Contact Information
